about.title: About Beauty Within
about.description: At Beauty Within, we believe true beauty comes from balance. Our certified therapists offer a full range of treatments—from gentle waxing and soothing reflexology to luxurious facials and hot stone massage—all in a calm, welcoming environment. Personalized care and expert techniques ensure you leave feeling refreshed, renewed, and completely cared for.

items.title: Massage Therapy
items.description: Choose from Swedish, deep tissue, hot stone or aromatherapy massage to relieve tension and promote total relaxation.

items.title: Facials
items.description: Customized skincare treatments using premium products to cleanse, exfoliate, and hydrate for a radiant complexion.

items.title: Reflexology
items.description: Pressure-point therapy on the hands and feet to improve energy flow, reduce stress, and support overall wellness.

items.title: Indian Head Massage
items.description: Traditional Ayurvedic techniques to relieve headaches, ease neck tension, and restore mental clarity.

items.title: Hot Stone Massage
items.description: Smooth heated stones glide over muscles for deep warmth and tension release in one indulgent experience.

items.title: Aromatherapy
items.description: Therapeutic essential-oil blends selected for your needs, combined with gentle massage to uplift body and mind.

items.title: Manicure & Pedicure
items.description: Nail shaping, cuticle care, massage and polish or gel finish to leave your hands and feet looking flawless.

items.title: Waxing
items.description: Professional hair removal for brows, lip, chin, legs and more—smooth, long-lasting results with minimal discomfort.

items.title: Certified Professionals
items.description: All treatments delivered by fully qualified, insured therapists with years of experience.

items.title: Personalized Care
items.description: Each session is tailored to your unique needs and preferences for maximum benefit.

items.title: Flexible Scheduling
items.description: Early, late and weekend appointments available to work around your busy life.

items.title: Premium Products
items.description: We use only top-quality, cruelty-free brands chosen for safety and performance.

items.question: How do I prepare for my first reflexology session?
items.answer: Wear loose, comfortable clothing and arrive a few minutes early to relax. No special preparation is needed.

items.question: Is waxing suitable for sensitive skin?
items.answer: Yes—we use gentle, hypoallergenic waxes and techniques to minimize irritation on all skin types.

items.question: Can I combine treatments?
items.answer: Absolutely. Ask about our combo packages to pair massage with a facial or other services for great savings.

items.question: What is your cancellation policy?
items.answer: We require 12 hours’ notice to avoid a 50% cancellation fee. Thank you for your understanding.

contact.title: Get in Touch
